document_data.name: Runehunt
document_data.mainbody: A '''runehunt''' was a religious ceremony observed by the [[Uthgardt]] barbarians of the [[Savage Frontier]].
document_data.Description: A runehunt was held during the Uthgardt [[Runemeet]] in the month of [[Eleint]]. At this time the future warriors of a tribe would seek victory over their tribe's enemy, which usually involved [[orc]]s. Upon successfully returning from a runehunt, the candidates would then participate in the ''[[telhut]]''.
